name: Mammals Photography
info: When I try to photograph the mammals, I follow the constant movements that make them tricky to capture. In addition, these animals are commonly found in the woods and appear only during dusk or dawn.

name: Bird Photography
info: The flight of a bird and its fast-paced movement intrigues me to photograph them. However, considering the quick move of birds, deep understanding of the subjects behavior is required.

name: Underwater Photography
info: This form of photography demands the knowledge of sophisticated equipment and techniques to access the subjects, which I love to show.

name: Aerial Photography
info: Wildlife Aerial photography is a pretty challenging genre which mainly deals with capturing the images of wild animals with the help of drone cameras.
